title: Comforting custom-home features, Fire Pit, Redwood dry heat sauna
posting_body: ['The Palmer', '1345 Towne Lake Hills S Drive, Woodstock, GA, 30189', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome Home to The Palmer', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1408 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Unwind at The Palmer, offering spacious one, two and three bedroom floor plans and newly renovated interior features.', "Here you're close to historic Woodstock, shopping, golf, and minutes from downtown Atlanta.", 'Located in the highly rated Cherokee school district, with features like garages and garden baths.', "There's a perfect home for you at The Palmer Apartments.", 'Features', '- Cozy gas & wood-burning fireplaces with charming mantles and slate hearths', '- Spa-like bathrooms feature', '- Private patio or balcony', '- Comforting custom-home features', '- Built-in bookshelves', '- Double vanities in bathrooms', '- Oversized whirlpool and garden baths', '- Dens', 'Community Amenities', '- 2 picnic areas with grills and tables', '- Outdoor stainless steel grill', '- Athletic facility with aerobics center', '- Redwood dry heat sauna', '- Dog Park', '- Gated Community', '- Two dazzling swimming pools', '- Playground', '- Lit tennis courts with pavilion', '- Fire Pit', '- Garages available with remote access', '- Paved walking track', '- Car Wash', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'ivcR1W9R2tm']
